Question: This person forced Israel, the UK, and France to end their invasion of Egypt during the Suez Crisis of 1956.
Hints: This person requested consideration for either Annapolis or West Point with his U.S Senator, Joseph L Bristow.
This person met and fell in love with Mamie Geneva Doud of Boone, Iowa, six years his junior, while he was stationed in Texas.
Most Arab countries were skeptical about the "this person doctrine" because they considered "Zionist imperialism" the real danger.
